page.title: 08COOMBE DINGLE and Authors
page.content: It is an area of{housing}and also an area of{woodland.}It is a quiet place to live and very clean. You can get to Lawrence Weston and Kingsweston through the woods. Through the woods there is a{stream}which is very popular with children because they catch little fish and paddle in the water. In the woods there are lots of pathways for people to walk along and car parks for people to park their cars. The place makes you feel you are in the country though you are near the town. People come from all around Bristol to see this lovely place. Some of the pathways are very steep and you can go climbing on the rocks. {AUTHORS OF THIS D BLOCK:} Teacher Lawrence Weston School {Adrian Bennett St. Bedes School {Peter Harvey {Gary Wilkinson Weston Park Primary School {Susan Hook
